channel.title: What do you need?
channel.description: Ok ive been wondering for a long time now, ive wondered how many posts you need to become a senior member :cool: can anyone help me out :)

item.title: What do you need?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:3, topic:42865”]100 Posts for senior member, 50+ reputation for community member.

You get reputation by helping people, making good posts, and contributing to the community, and knowing Java.[/quote]

Fixed

Read full topic

item.title: What do you need?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:3, topic:42865”]100 Posts for senior member, 50+ reputation for community member.

You get reputation by helping people, making good posts, and contributing to the community.[/quote]

I’ve been doing alot of that.See how many links of tuts I posted,helped peoples questions,told them they’re topic was in the wrong section and told them what to do with servers.Not to mention my astonishing good grammar lol.

EDIT: w00t I GOT THREE REPUTATION POINTS! AT MEMBER.YOU BARLEY SEE ANYONE HAVE REP POINTS EXCEPT MOPARSCAPE CM MEMBERS!! WOOHOO.THREE REP AT MEMBER WOOOT!!!

Read full topic

item.title: What do you need?

item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

100 Posts for senior member, 50+ reputation for community member.

You get reputation by helping people, making good posts, and contributing to the community.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you need?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Im pretty sure it’s 100-500.It’s 1-5 for CBA to post,10-50 for junior member,50-120 for member,and 120-300 for senior member,and 300+ for Moparscape CM ( community member ).

Of course,these are all just rough estimates I took.Don’t be dissapointed if you get the required numer of posts I posted here,but dont get the rank.I said,-these are rough estimates.

Hope this answers your question.

BTW-If a mod can correct this,please do.

Read full topic
